Package com.forgerock.opendj.cli

Class BooleanArgument.Builder

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.forgerock.opendj.cli.BooleanArgument.Builder
  • Enclosing class:
    BooleanArgument
    public static final class BooleanArgument.Builder
extends Object
    A fluent API for incrementally constructing BooleanArgument.
